divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the truck with Xxxxx and his friend by Michel Park Plaza. When they noticed a object that resembled a airplane because the light. We stoped to watch it. It made no noise and I only seen two realy bright lights that looked like a star but kept moving. It disappeared within about three minutes. It was nowhere to be found.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in St. Joseph
There were no other sightings in St. Joseph on or around December 18th 2012
Summary: Two, white star like objects move across the sky then disappeared.
